item.title: From Casino to Community: The Story of Pair A Dice Trailer Park Las Vegas
item.description:
A Dicey Start: The Pair-A-Dice Casino and its Origins

Long before the mega-resorts and the dazzling spectacle of the Las Vegas Strip, North Las Vegas was a different kind of frontier. In 1956, the Pair-A-Dice Club casino opened its doors at 2067 North Las Vegas Boulevard. While it never reached the heights of the downtown casinos or the later Strip behemoths, it was part of the burgeoning entertainment scene that helped define early Las Vegas. Like many establishments of the era, the Pair-A-Dice likely played a role in the cityâ€™s rapid expansion and the development of surrounding areas.
